install.name: sh404sef - Offline code plugin
install.author: Yannick Gaultier
install.description: Render Joomla's offline page with the appropriate http response code

param.name: disallowAdminAccess
param.label: Disallow admin access while offline
param.description: If set to Yes, access to frontend will also be disabled for administrators of the site (while Joomla default offline screen allows administrators to login)

param.name: retry_after_delay
param.label: Delay for Retry-after header
param.description: Delay in seconds to be set as a header, to tell search engines when then should try come back and revisit the site
